name: part_011
file: tmp_【 重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ2周年LIVE 『ANIMAL』【3D LIVE】 [oU85vmx7jn8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui performs the song 'Bunny' on stage with backup dancers.
A short instrumental transition with visuals of roses and cherry blossoms.
Takane Lui performs the song 'Fukurou-san' (Mr. Owl).

subtitles.original: うさっちゃえ 分じゃえ 待ったわに
subtitles.english: Let's bunny up, share it, wait a while

subtitles.english: I'll be right by your side

subtitles.english: Expert in being calculatingly cute

subtitles.english: After all, of course, I'm a maiden

subtitles.english: Making rouge flowers bloom perfectly

subtitles.english: Paint them on my lips and give a light wink

subtitles.english: Bunny, bunny-bunny

subtitles.english: The zipper on the back

subtitles.english: I can't pull it down, Bunny

subtitles.english: Expect more, and then

subtitles.original: ボロボロ ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Worn out, hey!

subtitles.original: くだんない範疇で
subtitles.english: Within a trivial range

subtitles.original: たぶっちゃえ もっちゃえ ニキショウバイ
subtitles.english: Deceive them, take them, business is good

subtitles.original: うさっちゃえ 飛んじゃえ だったチャーミング
subtitles.english: Bunny up, fly high, was so charming

subtitles.original: 愛取るだのバニー
subtitles.english: Like an idol, Bunny

subtitles.original: 転んだり噛んだり可愛いじゃん

subtitles.original: 期待して恋してメロメロ
subtitles.english: Expect more, fall in love, head over heels

subtitles.original: 痒いけど愛して バニバニ ヘイ！
subtitles.english: It's irritating, but love me, Bunny-bunny, hey!

subtitles.original: あーあ 人生ゲームね フクロウさん
subtitles.english: Ah, it's the game of life, isn't it, Mr. Owl?

subtitles.original: まだ面倒なんてやだったった
subtitles.english: I still hated dealing with trouble

subtitles.original: ラスト2曲！盛り上がっていきましょう！
subtitles.english: Last two songs! Let's get excited!

subtitles.original: 全然足りないテスト赤点
subtitles.english: Failing grades on tests, nowhere near enough

subtitles.original: 仕方がないから石を投げ
subtitles.english: Nothing I can do but throw stones

subtitles.original: 万年冴えない私に万歳
subtitles.english: Cheers to the forever dull me

subtitles.original: 努力がないから恨まれる
subtitles.english: Resented because I don't put in the effort

subtitles.original: ホロリホロリと泣き声が
subtitles.english: Tearfully, tearfully, the sound of crying

subtitles.original: ポロリポロリ溢れだした
subtitles.english: Trickle, trickle, it started to overflow

subtitles.original: のらりくらりと生きたいな
subtitles.english: I want to live aimlessly, idly

subtitles.original: そろりそろりじゃいけないの
subtitles.english: Tiptoeing along just won't do

subtitles.original: やりがいなんてない 怠けていたい
subtitles.english: There's no fulfillment, I just want to be lazy

subtitles.original: 決めものになれない
subtitles.english: I can't become a deciding factor

subtitles.original: あーあ 人生ゲームね フクロウさん
subtitles.english: Ah, it's the game of life, isn't it, Mr. Owl?

subtitles.original: もう関係ない ほら関係ない
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter anymore, see, it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 何年たってもフクロウさん まだ面倒なんてやー！
subtitles.english: No matter how many years pass, Mr. Owl, trouble is still a no!

subtitles.original: オーマイガー社会では
subtitles.english: Oh my god, in society

subtitles.original: ヤンキーなんかじゃいけないよ
subtitles.english: You can't just be a delinquent

subtitles.original: オーマイガー世間では
subtitles.english: Oh my god, in the world

subtitles.original: 苦労が美徳になるからだったった ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Suffering becomes a virtue, and that was that, hey!

subtitles.original: 天才少年は孤独を抱いて
subtitles.english: The boy genius embraces his loneliness

subtitles.original: 愛なんてないから眠れない
subtitles.english: He can't sleep because there's no love

subtitles.original: 天然少女は容姿も照れ
subtitles.english: The airheaded girl is shy about her looks

subtitles.original: わざとじゃないから睨まれる
subtitles.english: She gets glared at, though it's not on purpose

subtitles.original: ホロリホロリと泣き声が
subtitles.english: Tearfully, tearfully, the sound of crying

subtitles.english: Trickle, trickle, it soaked tomorrow

subtitles.original: のらりくらりと生きたいな
subtitles.english: I want to live aimlessly, idly

subtitles.original: そろりそろりじゃうるさいの
subtitles.english: Just tiptoeing is annoying

subtitles.original: あー問題だらけのフクロウさん
subtitles.english: Ah, Mr. Owl is full of problems

subtitles.original: でも最強じゃん ほら最強じゃん
subtitles.english: But he's the strongest, see, he's the strongest

subtitles.original: 将来なるならフクロウさん ただ根性なんてねー
subtitles.english: If I become anything, let it be Mr. Owl, just no willpower...

subtitles.original: オーマイガー奴らには
subtitles.english: Oh my god, for them

subtitles.original: 見えないものが多すぎて
subtitles.english: There are too many things they can't see

subtitles.original: オーマイガー世間では
subtitles.english: Oh my god, in the world

subtitles.original: 真面目が美学になるからだったった ヘイ！
subtitles.english: Seriousness becomes an aesthetic, and that was that, hey!

subtitles.original: 何も背負わないで 無責任と流さないで
subtitles.english: Don't carry anything, don't brush it off as irresponsibility

subtitles.original: あなたが今飛べるなら フクロウでもいいんじゃないの
subtitles.english: If you can fly now, isn't being an owl just fine?

subtitles.original: あーあ 人生ゲームね フクロウさん
subtitles.english: Ah, it's the game of life, isn't it, Mr. Owl?

subtitles.original: もう関係ない ほら関係ない
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter anymore, see, it doesn't matter

subtitles.original: 何年たってもフクロウさん まだ面倒...
subtitles.english: No matter how many years pass, Mr. Owl, trouble is still...
